terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback
Class FeedbackTrigger

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.FeedbackTrigger
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeedbackTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionTrigger, SelectTrigger, StatusTrigger
public class FeedbackTrigger
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeedbackTarget

A feedback trigger base class that tracks the feedback state and selectively passes input and internal feedback events to the event target. Repeat action and status events are rejected. Repeat select events are allowed. The trigger conditions apply to their respective event types independantly (i.e. like an output event filter for each feedback event type).

The FeedbackTarget event interface is included as input in feedback triggers so that the target feedback state can be initialized and so that the trigger can be slaved to another trigger such as a master feedback or selection manager. To prevent looping input events are ignored during output event generation.

setStatusFlags

public void setStatusFlags(int flags)
Sets the trigger condition status state flags. The default is Feedback.STATUS_ALL. Only these events will be output.

Parameters:
flags - Status state flags (Feedback.STATUS_???).
